data.actual_result: The text goes underneath the right side instead of wrapping
data.expected_result: The "Online" text should wrap under the number of friends you have online
data.short_description: Friends online counter goes underneath the right side instead of splitting onto two lines in several languages (Example Norwegian)
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch language to Norwegian - Observe how the text is going underneath the right side and be disappointed you barely have friends online
